ModMetaData.name: [XND] Vanilla-Friendly Animal Surgery (Continued)

- Replaced the patches with assemblies instead, should now work on all animals similar to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2270547158][XND] Animal Armor (Continued)[/url]
